text: Kheun si Yahudi ngon si Nasara Kamoe aneukda geunaseh Allah Takheun pakon cit Neuazeub gata Sabab le dacha tapubuet salah Tapi gata dum pih manusia Bandum teuh hamba peuneujeut Allah Neuampon dacha got pih Neuazeub Soe-soe nyang meuhâ€˜eut Neuh buet Potallah Langet ngon bumoe got antaranyan Bandum atra nyan keurajeun Allah Bandum teuh tawoe ubak Hadharat
